harking_assessment.explanation: No explicit methodological statement. Revealed approach is inductive - conclusions about early contact emerge from pattern recognition in genetic data. No HARKing concerns.

classification_justification: Empirical archaeogenetics study using genome-wide data. Inductive approach: genetic patterns (clines, clusters, admixture) identified first, then interpreted to reconstruct population history. Conclusions about timing and nature of contact emerge from data exploration.
